strapiJob.title: Career Navigator
strapiJob.description: The Career Navigator will provide individualized career navigation services for refugees and immigrants seeking career advancement. The Career Navigator will work one on one with each participant to identify career goals and determine the best pathway to achieve those goals. This includes but is not limited to career exploration, overcoming barriers, accessing trainings, building soft skills for career advancement, and making a connection between the participants and employers. 40 hours per week, salaried with benefits.
